Sentencas: Ultrafine powders of calcium substituted lanthanum chromite with average particle size of 0.57 mu m, synthesized by a simple process of autoignition of citrate-nitrate gels, can be sintered at relatively low temperatures (1200-1250 degrees C) compared to those normally reported.
Titulo: Low temperature sintering of La(Ca) CrO3 prepared by an autoignition process

Sentencas: The sintered samples show adequate electrical conductivity and thermal expansion behavior at 1000 degrees C for using it as an interconnect material for solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Low temperature sintering of La(Ca) CrO3 prepared by an autoignition process
